sections.title: Performance Metrics (Current State)
sections.content: Critical Issues Identified 1. Editor Page: 376 kB first load (CKEditor bundle) 2. Homepage: 198 kB first load (target: <150 kB) 3. Category Pages: 197 kB first load 4. CSS Bundle: 31.2 kB global s...

sections.title: Technology Stack Assessment
sections.content: Outdated Dependencies - Browserslist: caniuse-lite outdated - Node.js: v22.20.0 (newer than required) - Next.js: 12.x (target: 14.x for modernization)   Security Issues   - NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUT...

sections.title: Performance Targets for Modernization
sections.content: Bundle Size Targets - Homepage: 198 kB → 150 kB (25% reduction) - Category Pages: 197 kB → 150 kB (24% reduction) - Article Pages: 188 kB → 140 kB (26% reduction) - Editor Page: 376 kB → 250 kB (3...

sections.title: Optimization Opportunities
sections.content: 1. Code Splitting - CKEditor: Lazy load in admin panel only - Admin Components: Separate bundle from public pages - Image Libraries: Dynamic imports for optimization   2. CSS Optimization - Boot...

sections.title: Constitutional Compliance
sections.content: ✅ Modern Stack Maintenance: Performance baseline established   ✅ Backward Compatibility: Current metrics preserved for comparison   ✅ Test-Driven Upgrades: Performance tests planned in T017, T066-T0...

title: Security Audit Report
content:
Security Audit Report

 Table of Contents

- [Summary](summary)
- [Critical Vulnerabilities (Priority 1)](critical-vulnerabilities-priority-1)
  - [1. @babel/traverse < 7.23.2](1-babel-traverse-7-23-2)
  - [2. Next.js ≤ 14.2.31](2-next-js-14-2-31)
  - [3. form-data vulnerabilities](3-form-da

sections.title: Summary
sections.content: - Total Vulnerabilities: 66 - Critical: 7 - High: 30   - Moderate: 23 - Low: 6

sections.title: Critical Vulnerabilities (Priority 1)
sections.content: 1. @babel/traverse < 7.23.2 - Risk: Arbitrary code execution - Impact: Code compilation vulnerability - Fix: npm audit fix   2. Next.js ≤ 14.2.31 - Risk: Multiple vulnerabilities including CDN c...

sections.title: High Priority Dependencies for Modernization
sections.content: Framework Updates (Addresses Multiple Vulnerabilities) 1. Next.js: 12.x → 14.x+ (addresses 7+ vulnerabilities) 2. React: Current → 18.3.x (compatibility with Next.js 14)   3. Bootstrap: 4.6.2 → 5.3...

sections.title: Constitutional Compliance Assessment
sections.content: ✅ Modern Stack Maintenance: 66 vulnerabilities identified for immediate resolution   ✅ Backward Compatibility: Security fixes preserve functionality   ✅ Test-Driven Upgrades: Security fixes will be ...

sections.title: Remediation Strategy
sections.content: Phase 1: Safe Updates (Non-Breaking) bash npm audit fix  Impact: Resolves ~40 vulnerabilities without breaking changes   Phase 2: Framework Updates (Breaking Changes - Part of Modernization) ba...

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.content: 1. Apply non-breaking security fixes immediately 2. Include security validation in all modernization tests   3. Implement security scanning in CI/CD pipeline 4. Document security improvements in ea...

sections.title: Database Configuration
sections.content: - Test Database: nextauth_test (isolated from production nextauth) - Connection: MongoDB localhost:27017 - Data: Seeded with sample news articles for testing

sections.title: Firebase Test Configuration
sections.content: - Project: tskulis-test (separate from production) - Storage: Isolated storage bucket for test images - Functions: Test endpoints for image upload/optimization

sections.title: Status
sections.content: ✅ T002 COMPLETED: Isolated testing environment configured   ✅ Constitutional Compliance: Test environment preserves production integrity

sections.content: Developer Experience - IDE Support: Better autocomplete and error detection - Refactoring Safety: Confident code changes with type checking - Documentation: Types serve as inline documentation   ...
